subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A.’s 57 referees met for seven hours Wednesday and unanimously rejected the N.B.A.’s latest offer, but are determined to reach terms on a new contract.
snippet: The N.B.A.’s 57 referees met for seven hours Wednesday and unanimously rejected the N.B.A.’s latest offer, but are determined to reach terms on a new contract.
